articles.title: West Bengal minister Sadhan Pande passes away, CM Mamata Banerjee offers condolences - India Today
articles.description: West Bengal cabinet minister Sadhan Pande passed away on Sunday morning in Mumbai. West Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee offered condolences on the demise of the TMC leader.
